PERSONA:
meet james, a 35-year-old african american man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast, specifically in the middle atlantic region. he has a high school diploma but no further formal education. james has never been married and identifies himself as very liberal politically, aligning with the democratic party.

despite his liberal leanings, james doesn't affiliate with any particular religion and seldom attends religious services, considering himself unaffiliated with any faith. he was born in the united states and is a citizen, though he refused to disclose his specific birthplace.

economically, james falls into the lower-income bracket, earning less than $30,000 annually. however, he is registered to vote at his current address and takes an active interest in civic affairs. james is a frequent internet user, being almost constantly online.

in his free time, james doesn't engage in volunteerism or community service activities. he leads a relatively independent lifestyle, focused on his personal interests and pursuits. overall, james is a urban-dwelling, liberal-minded individual navigating life with his high school education and limited financial means.
